description.value:
Galeborn ixudo generally have brighter scale colors, slightly more feathers, and stand about a half-foot or more taller than other ixudo.

Galeborn are generally the upper class of ixudo culture, with easier access to leadership and master engineering positions.

system.classDetails:
Galeborn Ixudo Traits

  • Compatibility: Avian
  • Attribute Increase: Your Dexterity increases by 1.
  • Extra Language: You can speak, read, and write one language of your choice.
  • Engineer: Choose one of the following:
    • Only if you already have proficiency in Intelligence (Craft) from elsewhere: 
      • You gain expertise in Intelligence (Craft).
    • You have proficiency in the Intelligence (Craft) and Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) skills.
  • Trade Proficiency: You are proficient in one Trade your choice.
  • Racial Trinket: You gain an extra trinket, roll on the Mechanical Trinket Table to determine which trinket. You built this trinket in your childhood, but have been unable to replicate it since then.
